author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ... امروز روزيست که بحر رحمت ظاهر است و آفتاب عنايت مشرق و سحاب جود مرتفع بايد نفوس پژمرده را بنسائم محبّت و مودّت و مياه مرحمت تازه و خرم نمود احبّای الهی در هر مجمع و محفلی که جمع شوند بايد بقسمی
translation: This is the Day whereon the Ocean of God’s mercy hath been manifested unto men, the Day in which the Daystar of His loving-kindness hath shed its radiance upon them, the Day in which the clouds of His bountiful favor have overshadowed the whole of mankind. Now is the time to cheer and refresh the down-cast through the invigorating breeze of love and fellowship, and the living waters of friendliness and charity.
